channel.title: diablo on Dojo Viz

item.title: BvB Setup
item.description: BvB PvP Guide I know you never expected that, me neither. However I am playing diablo since the day Diablo 2 released. And always have been a fan of barbarian, especially WW barb. so I will give some information about how to utilize a great BvB Barbarian PvP character with extra info about other setups. This will be a short one since the other big part is the experince. First things first!
